comments.body: Classes are an Alloy concept and can only used there. If you want to add / remove a class to an alloy view, please check [addClass()|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Alloy.Controller-method-addClass] and [removeClass|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/api/Alloy.Controller-method-removeClass] in the Alloy reference. Thx!
